variants.Description in input context: This variant is a missense mutation that results in the substitution of proline (Pro) with leucine (Leu) at position 264.

Material used.Material Source: Patient DNA samples and reference DNA sample
Material used.Description: The experiment was performed on patient DNA samples and a reference DNA sample.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_004168.5:c.792C>T, p.(Pro264Leu) was found in the patient's DNA sample.

Biological replicates.Description: Since this is a diagnostic test, only one sample per patient was tested.

Technical replicates.Description: Each PCR reaction was run in duplicate to ensure the accuracy of the results.

Basic positive control.Description: Since this is a diagnostic test, there was no need for a basic positive control.

Basic negative control.Basic negative control: Reference DNA sample with no mutation
Basic negative control.Description: The reference DNA sample did not have the variant NM_004168.5:c.792C>T, p.(Pro264Leu).

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not applicable, as this is a qualitative assay.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Presence of the variant NM_004168.5:c.792C>T, p.(Pro264Leu) in the patient's DNA sample.
